verbose_text: We further show that both avian and mammalian OASL can reversibly exchange to activate and magnify the OAS / RNase L and OASL / RIG-I system by introducing only three key residues, suggesting that ancient OASL possess 2-5A [p x 5'A (2'p5'A) n; x = 1-3; n> = 2] activity and has functionally switched to the OASL / RIG-I pathway recently.
evidence: OASL can reversibly exchange to activate and magnify the OAS/RNase L and OASL/RIG-I
